roleset.name: fail to put garbage in the right place
roleset.note: LITTER-V NOTES: Frames file for 'litter' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 9.8. Also in 28, but I can't get that reading, so I'm going to ignore it. (from litter.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: passive
example.text: Result: [a landscape]-1 littered [*]-1 with lemons, huge debt burdens crushing down upon the arch and spans of corporate America.
